alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 2:53PM EST until December 29 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Ice accumulations of a glaze up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Southern Piscataquis, Northern Washington, and Central Penobscot Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southern Piscataquis
